text: Curci is an Italian surname that may refer to *Amelita Galli-Curci (1882–1963), Italian soprano **Amelita Galli-Curci Estate in New York, U.S. **Galli-Curci Theatre in New York, U.S. *Carlo Curci (1846-after 1916), Italian painter *Carlo Maria Curci (1810–1891), Italian theologian *Fran Curci (born 1938), American football player and coach *Freddy Curci (born 1962), Canadian rock vocalist and songwriter *Gianluca Curci (born 1985), Italian football goalkeeper *Ofelia Giudicissi Curci (1934–1981), Italian poet and archeologist Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Curci
